summary: Skip the intro and start right after the Helgen. Clean save game.
descriptionHtml:
Vergil the Nephilim Alternate Beginning  

[IMG]http://www.villanousity.com/forums/uploads/profile/photo-1374.jpg?_r=1349745671[/IMG]

Requirements:  
-Skyrim v.1.8.151.0.7 
-Update.ESM 
-DLC: Dawnguard & Hearthfires. 
-ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full or newer ~~ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Recommended:
Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes / Faces - YoungerGeonoxFaces ~~ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Details:
Clean game & lvl 1, Race = Nord. 
The character starts right outside of Helgen cave.

Installation:
Drag & drop the \"savefile.ess\" to Document/My games/Skyrim/Saves
author: Gameruk01
